alert.note: Alert for North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 2:36PM PST until December 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph and create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County
